
```{r}
combined.sct = readRDS("/Users/laurapaez/Downloads/combined_kb_filtered.rds")

SaveH5Seurat(combined.sct, filename = "seu_obj.h5Seurat")
Convert("seu_obj.h5Seurat", dest = "h5ad")
```
